Robbins Geller Rudman & Dowd and The Gross Law Firm have set lead-plaintiff deadlines for plaintiffs in Khan v. Lockheed Martin, covering purchases from January 2024 to July 2025.

Lockheed Martin Corporation (LMT) shares have eased as a flurry of securities class action lawsuits allege misleading disclosures in its Aeronautics and RMS segments, overshadowing neutral analyst interest despite growing attention from Zacks.
